data.name: Car Wash TD - Tower Defense Demo
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.00 GHz / AMD
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX950
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
